body:
`spack test` produces errors on Python 3.7 in the Travis build

### Error Message

See: https://travis-ci.org/spack/spack/jobs/418414627 from https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/8819

### Information on your system

This occurs on Travis. I have not tested it with Python 3.7 elsewhere.
title: "spack test" errors in Python 3.7
